yu.einstein.gdp2.core.DAS
Class DASConnector

java.lang.Object
  yu.einstein.gdp2.core.DAS.DASConnector

public class DASConnector
extends java.lang.Object

Provides tools to connect and retrieve data from a DAS server
See http://www.biodas.org/documents/spec.html

Version:
0.1
Author:
Julien Lajugie
